comments.raw_text: certutil uses CERT_VerifyCertificate. We should convert it to use libpkix's CERT_PKIXVerifyCert instead.
comments.creator: brian@briansmith.org
comments.text: certutil uses CERT_VerifyCertificate. We should convert it to use libpkix's CERT_PKIXVerifyCert instead.
comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
